description: Opis was an ancient city of Babylonia located on the Tigris River close to the site of modern Baghdad.
details:
The Barrington Atlas Directory notes: Tell Mujeili'

Adams 1965 no. 590 notes a significant site with surface material dating from Cassite to Neo-Babylonian. The sequence of Early Dynastic to Old Babylonian is also attested.
